user.title: E-Redes Smart Metering Plus
user.description:
Your webhook URL has been generated. Configure this URL in your E-Redes provider dashboard to receive smart meter data:

**{webhook_url}**

Copy this URL and paste it into your E-Redes provider dashboard, then click submit to complete the setup.

ðŸ’¡ **Nabu Casa Subscribers:** If you have Home Assistant Cloud, you can manage your webhooks by going to Settings > Home Assistant Cloud > Webhooks in your Home Assistant.

init.title: E-Redes Webhook Configuration
init.description:
This is your webhook URL that should be configured in your E-Redes provider dashboard:

**{webhook_url}**

Copy this URL and paste it into your E-Redes provider dashboard to receive smart meter data.

ðŸ’¡ **Nabu Casa Subscribers:** You can manage your webhooks by going to Settings > Home Assistant Cloud > Webhooks in your Home Assistant.
